meanings.definition: Triamcinolones: a group of synthetic corticosteroids used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed triamcinolones to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: Many patients find relief from their symptoms after taking triamcinolones.
meanings.sent3: After taking triamcinolones, I felt like a deflated balloon, but in a good way!
meanings.sent4: Her inflammation vanished like magic after the first dose of triamcinolones.
meanings.sent5: The power of triamcinolones to calm the body's reactions is truly remarkable.
